keyword: how many calories in 8oz of chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 8 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 8oz of chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, per-100g breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in 8 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (grilled or roasted), no added oil, sauces, or seasonings; 8 oz ≈ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, added ingredients, and exact weight; values based on USDA averages. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 8 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~375 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g during cooking
Baked with light breading per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 375 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz chicken breast?
Does skin affect calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes, skin-on adds ~30 kcal per 100 g due to extra fat.

faqs.q: Are carbs present in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g carbs, 0 g fiber, 0 g sugars per serving.

faqs.q: How does cooking method change calories?
faqs.a: Grilling or roasting keeps it low; frying or adding oil increases by 40+ kcal per tsp per 100 g.
